duties_responsibilities.duty: Good Knowledge in Enterprise Structure, Project leadership, and support of all active units and departments using SAP, with primary focus area on Transportation Management

Complete process know-how of transportation management processes, configuring and customizing Order, Must have minimum 5+ years of experience in providing SAP TM Technical services for implementation, support and upgrade project
Configure and maintain the relevant ECC/S4 HANA components including but not limited to SAP TM (including documentation), Support business users in delivery of end user training
Designs to-be business processes for transportation management based on SAP integration to TMS, Perform or manage production support of SAP business processes as needed

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, Business, or a related field (Master's preferred)
